author: Staff Reporter
text:
A total of 66 teams were monitoring the election expenditure in the six assembly constituencies in the district.

Chairing a meeting of team officials at the Collectorate, District Electoral Officer and Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy said that three flying squads, three video surveillance teams and three static surveillance teams were formed for each segment in the district. Hence, a total of 54 teams were involved in monitoring. Apart from that, six video screening teams and six expenditure committees were formed. Thus, a total of 66 teams were formed for monitoring election expenditure in the district, he added.

The Collector said that expenditure include wall advertisements, posters, banners, advertisements in newspapers and television and other media and expenses incurred towards conduct of public meetings. He said that GPS tracking devise was installed in all squad vehicles and movement of vehicles was monitored at the control room functioning at the Collectorate.
title: 66 teams monitoring election expenditure
